name: Athina AI
headline: Prototype, Experiment & Evaluate AI Pipelines in a Spreadsheet-like UI
description:
Athina is an end-to-end platform for product teams building production-grade AI features.

1. Prototype: Dynamic Columns let you run LLM prompts, execute code, make API calls, retrieve data, run transformations, and more (in a spreadsheet UI)

2. Evaluate: Run evaluations within the sheet itself - there are 50+ preset evaluation metrics or you can create your own custom evals (no-code).

3. Experiment: Change your prompt, model, retriever, or chain in just a few clicks. Technical users can run even more experiments programmatically.

4. Compare:  Compare any number of datasets side-by-side with a diff view, and run evaluations on all of them simultaneously

5. Observability: Monitor your LLM features in production with continuous evaluations and granular analytics.

Athina can be used by non-technical users as well as technical users. This means PMs, QA, Data Scientists, and Engineers can collaborate to build great AI products.

founders.name: Himanshu Bamoria, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder, Athina AI | Himanshu is a graduate from IIT Delhi and has been a serial entrepreneur. Before Athina, he co-founded a hyperlocal grocery delivery startup, Atcost, and scaled it from 0 -> $8M in revenue.

founders.name: Shiv Sakhuja, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder, Athina AI (https://athina.ai)

Previously worked as an engineer on Google Ad Recommendations, and Nest Platform. Prior to that, worked at Troops.ai (acq. by Salesforce), building natural language chatbots for work.

# Ship AI to prod 10x faster
![Hero Circle One](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/6716259337044b07a55d281e_Ellipse%20379.svg)![Hero Circle One](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/6716224bae4ff2d74182b567_Ellipse%20380.svg)![Hero Circle One](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/671623d3c887a70bfc5f1525_Ellipse%20381.svg)
Athina is a collaborative AI development platform designed for your team to build, test and monitor AI features.
[Get started for free](https://athina.ai/<https:/app.athina.ai/>)[Watch demo](https://athina.ai/<https:/www.loom.com/share/b31b267a0ab4456887944cd3199f4422?sid=04875b4e-b85c-4355-9927-7b58f81d8469>)

Re-generate datasets by changing the model, prompt, or retriever in a few clicks.
[Watch demo](https://athina.ai/<https:/www.loom.com/share/25ea01a2f27b46da9a51b79529d11d0f?sid=7928f0e8-9602-4a57-98e2-56aab818c011>)

Prototype powerful chains and run them programmatically
[Book a demo](https://athina.ai/<https:/cal.com/shiv-athina/30min>)
## Collaborate with your entire team
Athina enables both non-technical & technical users to collaborate on experiments, evaluating datasets and managing prompts and flows.
## Data Scientists
![Service Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/67109dbec1b4308c5de9d377_%E2%80%BB.svg)
### Work with your Data
Compare datasets side-by-side and interact with your datasets in powerful ways using SQL. 
[Explore documentation](https://athina.ai/<https:/docs.athina.ai/datasets>)
[Watch Demo](https://athina.ai/<#>)
![Service Item Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/672929c0d73b2690f3fad766_sql-and-sheet.png)
## Product Manager
### No-code AI Engineering
Build complex AI flows without the engineering complexity
[Book a demo](https://athina.ai/<https:/cal.com/shiv-athina/30min>)
[Watch Demo](https://athina.ai/<#>)
![Service Item Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/6725216681cee042bf834adf_product%20manager.webp)
## QA Team
### For your Human QA team
Humans are able to pick up on nuances that automated evals might not be able to.Athina is designed for human QA teams to work side-by-side with AI evaluations.
[Book a demo](https://athina.ai/<https:/cal.com/shiv-athina/30min>)
[Watch Demo](https://athina.ai/<#>)
![Service Item Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/672524e55fff634f82a76e0b_QA%20image.webp)
## Engineers
![Service Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/671205b5815745137dc55527_%E2%80%BB.svg)
### Access everything in just a few lines of code
Everything in Athina works with or without your code.Engineers are able to run prompts, flows, and evaluations programmatically, while non-technical users can use the UI.
[Explore documentation](https://athina.ai/<https:/docs.athina.ai>)
[Watch Demo](https://athina.ai/<#>)
```
import os  
---  
from athina.evals import DoesResponseAnswerQuery, ContextContainsEnoughInformation, Faithfulness  
from athina.loaders import Loader  
from athina.keys import AthinaApiKey, OpenAiApiKey  
from athina.runner.run import EvalRunner  
from athina.datasets import yc_query_mini  
import pandas as pd  
from dotenv import load_dotenv  
load_dotenv()  
# Configure an API key.  
OpenAiApiKey.set_key(os.getenv('OPENAI_API_KEY'))  
# Evaluate a dataset across a suite of eval criteria  
EvalRunner.run_suite(  
  evals=[  
    RagasAnswerCorrectness(),  
    RagasContextPrecision(),  
    RagasContextRelevancy(),  
    RagasContextRecall(),  
    RagasFaithfulness(),  
    ResponseFaithfulness(),  
    Groundedness(),  
    ContextSufficiency(),  
  ],  
  data=dataset,  
  max_parallel_evals=10  
)  


```

```
import os  
---  
from athina_client.prompt import Prompt, Slug  
from athina_client.keys import AthinaApiKey  
AthinaApiKey.set_key(os.getenv('ATHINA_API_KEY'))  
Prompt.create_prompt(  
  slug='test-staging',  
  prompt=[{  
    "role": "system",  
    "content": "You are an AI that answers questions in less than 50 words"  
  },  
  {  
    "role": "user",  
    "content": "what does {{company}} does?"  
  }],  
  model="gpt-4o",  
  commit_message="Initial prompt commit",  
  parameters={  
    "temperature": 0.5  
  }  
)  
Prompt.run_prompt(  
  slug='test-staging',  
  # the following fields are optional  
  version=2,  
  model="gpt-4o",  
  variables={  
    "company": "NVIDIA"  
  },  
  parameters={  
    "temperature": 1,  
    "max_tokens": 1000  
  },  
)  


```

```
from athina_logger.api_key import AthinaApiKey  
---  
AthinaApiKey.set_api_key(os.getenv('ATHINA_API_KEY'))  
response = client.chat.completions.create(  
   model='gpt-4-1106-preview',  
   messages=[{"role": "user", "content": "What is machine learning?"}],  
 )  
response = response.model_dump() # For openai > 1 version  
try:  
 InferenceLogger.log_inference(  
   prompt_slug="sdk_test",  
   prompt=messages,  
   language_model_id="gpt-4-1106-preview",  
   response=response,  
   external_reference_id="abc",  
   cost=0.0123,  
   custom_attributes={  
     "name": "John Doe"  
     # Your custom attributes  
   }  
 )  
except Exception as e:  
 if isinstance(e, CustomException):  
   print(e.status_code)  
   print(e.message)  
 else:  
   print(e)  


```

```
import os  
---  
from athina_client.keys import AthinaApiKey  
AthinaApiKey.set_key(os.getenv('ATHINA_API_KEY'))  
from athina_client.datasets import Dataset  
try:  
 dataset = Dataset.create(  
  name='test_dataset',  
  description="Optional description", # optional  
  language_model_id="gpt-4", # optional,  
  rows=[  
   { "query": "Who let the dogs out?", "response": "Who, who, who, who, who?" },  
   ...  
  ]  
 )  
except Exception as e:  
 print(f"Failed to create dataset: {e}")  


```

```
query GetPromptRuns($limit: Int!, $page: Int!) {  
---  
 getPromptRunsByFilters(limit: $limit, page: $page) {  
  id  
  org_id  
  prompt_slug  
  language_model_id  
  prompt_response  
  prompt_tokens  
 }  
}  


```

## Complete visibility into your production AI
[Monitoring](https://athina.ai/<#>)[Tracing](https://athina.ai/<#>)[Online evals](https://athina.ai/<#>)[Analytics](https://athina.ai/<#>)[Compare](https://athina.ai/<#>)
[Monitoring](https://athina.ai/<#>)[Tracing](https://athina.ai/<#>)[Online evals](https://athina.ai/<#>)
[Analytics](https://athina.ai/<#>)[Compare](https://athina.ai/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/6725440f73490b43001a6b9b_feature%20tab%201%20image.webp)
### Powerful Monitoring, designed for AI
AI traces have different monitoring requirements than traditional applications. Athina is built natively for capturing LLM traces.
[View logging docs](https://athina.ai/<https:/docs.athina.ai/logging/overview>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/672a840a61d4990515686d01_tracing.png)
### Trace every step, everytime
Tracing in Athina captures every step of your LLM flows, so you can replay what happened at every step of a trace.
[Learn more](https://athina.ai/<https:/docs.athina.ai/logging/overview>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/6732539b3a2ce675d097d71b_evals2.png)
### Continuous evaluation
Athina's online evaluations can be configured to run on your logs as they come in, so you always have visibility into accuracy.
[Learn more](https://athina.ai/<https:/docs.athina.ai/logging/overview>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/67295980fc86a994370defa9_analytics-v3.png)
### Segmented Analytics
Understand how model performance changes over time and across different segments
[Learn more](https://athina.ai/<https:/docs.athina.ai/logging/overview>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/67324f612b52e35f24432142_compare.png)
### Compare
Analytics in Athina are segmented at every level, so you can compare eval scores by prompt, model, topic or customer ID.
[Learn more](https://athina.ai/<https:/docs.athina.ai/logging/overview>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/67254325bf523be41ffb96a7_AI%20system%20background.webp)
## Your data, your rules
Athina ensures full data privacy with fine-grained access controls and deployment in your cloud environment.
[Book a demo](https://athina.ai/<https:/cal.com/shiv-athina/30min>)
### Access controls
[](https://athina.ai/<https:/cal.com/shiv-athina/30min?date=2024-10-22&month=2024-10>)
Configure fine-grained permissions so you can control which users can access different features and data.
### Self-hosted Deployments
[](https://athina.ai/<https:/cal.com/shiv-athina/30min?date=2024-10-22&month=2024-10>)
Deploy Athina entirely in your own VPC.Complete data privacy.
### SOC-2 Type 2 compliant
[](https://athina.ai/<https:/cal.com/shiv-athina/30min?date=2024-10-22&month=2024-10>)
Athina is compliant with SOC-2 Type 2 standards, ensuring that your data is secure and protected.
### Use custom models
[](https://athina.ai/<https:/cal.com/shiv-athina/30min?date=2024-10-22&month=2024-10>)
Access custom models and providers like Azure OpenAl, AWS Bedrock, and more.
## See how teams are accelerating AI development with Athina
### PhysicsWallah
Have been using Athina from a couple of months. I strongly believe LLM applications in production needs a strong observability and athina fits the bill. Also, seamless prototyping with prompts is also a great feature. Looking forward for a longer collaboration :)
Sandeep Varma, AI Lead
### You.com
We've been using Athina AI and it's been saving us so much time with our annotations. Previously, we'd have to curate our datasets amongst different annotators on Google Sheets and it's a massively painful process. With Athina, we're able to curate our datasets (with inter-annotator agreements) much more easily and create much higher quality Evals.
Jason Tang, Staff SWE
### Vetted
Athina has a broad set of powerful tools. We use it from prototyping a new idea, to refining it, to monitoring it production. It's a great product: comprehensive and user-friendly. We initially used Athina primarily for logging, but it has become increasingly integrated into our model development and evaluation process.
Andris Pelcbergs & Maria Gaska (Head of AI, Vetted)
### Richpanel
We are using Athina at Richpanel to build evals for our Customer Support AI Agents and already love the product. I would recommend it to everyone who wants to build reliably with LLMs.
Ashutosh Dubey, Engineer
### CourtCorrect
Me and my team reviewed 10+ frameworks for LLM experimentation and observability. We ended up going with Athina and are very happy with our choice! The experimentation suite is really flexible and integrating our applications and existing observability stack was really smooth. Big + for exposing observability data via API!
Robin Saberi, Head of AI (CourtCorrect)
### PhysicsWallah
Have been using Athina from a couple of months. I strongly believe LLM applications in production needs a strong observability and athina fits the bill. Also, seamless prototyping with prompts is also a great feature. Looking forward for a longer collaboration :)
Sandeep Varma, AI Lead
### You.com
We've been using Athina AI and it's been saving us so much time with our annotations. Previously, we'd have to curate our datasets amongst different annotators on Google Sheets and it's a massively painful process. With Athina, we're able to curate our datasets (with inter-annotator agreements) much more easily and create much higher quality Evals.
Jason Tang, Staff SWE
### Vetted
Athina has a broad set of powerful tools. We use it from prototyping a new idea, to refining it, to monitoring it production. It's a great product: comprehensive and user-friendly. We initially used Athina primarily for logging, but it has become increasingly integrated into our model development and evaluation process.
Andris Pelcbergs & Maria Gaska (Head of AI, Vetted)
### Richpanel

## Frequently asked questions
Find out more about how Athina works, how to integrate it, and how it can accelerate your AI development process
![FAQ Image Shape](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/6727367b0696de61ad6d9b1b_FAQArt.webp)
### Does Athina have a self-hosted deployment option?
![FAQ Minus Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/671137e1d43dd09a762b120a_-%20\(1\).svg)
Yes, Athina can be deployed as a self-hosted image. Contact hello@athina.ai for more information.
### Does Athina logging add any latency?
![FAQ Minus Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/671137e1d43dd09a762b120a_-%20\(1\).svg)
Nope, Athina logging can be performed as an async fire-and-forget operation, so it won't impact your latency.
### Does Athina support custom evaluations?
![FAQ Minus Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/671137e1d43dd09a762b120a_-%20\(1\).svg)
Yes, Athina enables you to configure custom evaluators. You can use a custom LLM evaluation, write a custom Python function, or even call an external API for evaluation.
### Does Athina work with Azure / Vertex / Bedrock?
![FAQ Minus Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/671137e1d43dd09a762b120a_-%20\(1\).svg)
Yes, you can use custom models hosted anywhere using Athina.
### How long does Athina take to integrate?
![FAQ Minus Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/671137e1d43dd09a762b120a_-%20\(1\).svg)
You can get set up with logging in just a few minutes. Visit https://docs.athina.ai/logging to get started.
### What kind of evaluations does Athina support?
![FAQ Minus Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670cb23343dfaffd7368be46/671137e1d43dd09a762b120a_-%20\(1\).svg)
Athina supports over 50 preset evaluations from providers like Athina, OpenAI, Ragas, Guardrails, and more. You can also configure custom evaluations using LLM-as-a-judge, or custom python functions.

## Engineers

### Access everything in just a few lines of code

Watch DemoâŸ¨28âŸ©
```
import os  
---  
from athina.evals import DoesResponseAnswerQuery, ContextContainsEnoughInformation, Faithfulness  
from athina.loaders import Loader  
from athina.keys import AthinaApiKey, OpenAiApiKey  
from athina.runner.run import EvalRunner  
from athina.datasets import yc_query_mini  
import pandas as pd  
from dotenv import load_dotenv  
load_dotenv()  
# Configure an API key.  
OpenAiApiKey.set_key(os.getenv('OPENAI_API_KEY'))  
# Evaluate a dataset across a suite of eval criteria  
EvalRunner.run_suite(  
  evals=[  
    RagasAnswerCorrectness(),  
    RagasContextPrecision(),  
    RagasContextRelevancy(),  
    RagasContextRecall(),  
    RagasFaithfulness(),  
    ResponseFaithfulness(),  
    Groundedness(),  
    ContextSufficiency(),  
  ],  
  data=dataset,  
  max_parallel_evals=10  
)  


```

```
import os  
---  
from athina_client.prompt import Prompt, Slug  
from athina_client.keys import AthinaApiKey  
AthinaApiKey.set_key(os.getenv('ATHINA_API_KEY'))  
Prompt.create_prompt(  
  slug='test-staging',  
  prompt=[{  
    "role": "system",  
    "content": "You are an AI that answers questions in less than 50 words"  
  },  
  {  
    "role": "user",  
    "content": "what does {{company}} does?"  
  }],  
  model="gpt-4o",  
  commit_message="Initial prompt commit",  
  parameters={  
    "temperature": 0.5  
  }  
)  
Prompt.run_prompt(  
  slug='test-staging',  
  # the following fields are optional  
  version=2,  
  model="gpt-4o",  
  variables={  
    "company": "NVIDIA"  
  },  
  parameters={  
    "temperature": 1,  
    "max_tokens": 1000  
  },  
)  


```

```
from athina_logger.api_key import AthinaApiKey  
---  
AthinaApiKey.set_api_key(os.getenv('ATHINA_API_KEY'))  
response = client.chat.completions.create(  
   model='gpt-4-1106-preview',  
   messages=[{"role": "user", "content": "What is machine learning?"}],  
 )  
response = response.model_dump() # For openai > 1 version  
try:  
 InferenceLogger.log_inference(  
   prompt_slug="sdk_test",  
   prompt=messages,  
   language_model_id="gpt-4-1106-preview",  
   response=response,  
   external_reference_id="abc",  
   cost=0.0123,  
   custom_attributes={  
     "name": "John Doe"  
     # Your custom attributes  
   }  
 )  
except Exception as e:  
 if isinstance(e, CustomException):  
   print(e.status_code)  
   print(e.message)  
 else:  
   print(e)  


```

```
import os  
---  
from athina_client.keys import AthinaApiKey  
AthinaApiKey.set_key(os.getenv('ATHINA_API_KEY'))  
from athina_client.datasets import Dataset  
try:  
 dataset = Dataset.create(  
  name='test_dataset',  
  description="Optional description", # optional  
  language_model_id="gpt-4", # optional,  
  rows=[  
   { "query": "Who let the dogs out?", "response": "Who, who, who, who, who?" },  
   ...  
  ]  
 )  
except Exception as e:  
 print(f"Failed to create dataset: {e}")  


```

```
query GetPromptRuns($limit: Int!, $page: Int!) {  
---  
 getPromptRunsByFilters(limit: $limit, page: $page) {  
  id  
  org_id  
  prompt_slug  
  language_model_id  
  prompt_response  
  prompt_tokens  
 }  
}  


```

### Powerful Monitoring, designed for AI

Tracing in Athina captures every step of your LLM flows, so you can replay what happened at every step of a trace.

## See how teams are accelerating AI development with Athina
### PhysicsWallah
Have been using Athina from a couple of months. I strongly believe LLM applications in production needs a strong observability and athina fits the bill. Also, seamless prototyping with prompts is also a great feature. Looking forward for a longer collaboration :)
Sandeep Varma, AI Lead
### You.com
We've been using Athina AI and it's been saving us so much time with our annotations. Previously, we'd have to curate our datasets amongst different annotators on Google Sheets and it's a massively painful process. With Athina, we're able to curate our datasets (with inter-annotator agreements) much more easily and create much higher quality Evals.
Jason Tang, Staff SWE
### Vetted
Athina has a broad set of powerful tools. We use it from prototyping a new idea, to refining it, to monitoring it production. It's a great product: comprehensive and user-friendly. We initially used Athina primarily for logging, but it has become increasingly integrated into our model development and evaluation process.
Andris Pelcbergs & Maria Gaska (Head of AI, Vetted)

Ashutosh Dubey, Engineer

## Frequently asked questions
Find out more about how Athina works, how to integrate it, and how it can accelerate your AI development process
![FAQ Image ShapeâŸ¨45âŸ©]
### Does Athina have a self-hosted deployment option?
![FAQ Minus IconâŸ¨46âŸ©].svg)
Yes, Athina can be deployed as a self-hosted image. Contact hello@athina.ai for more information.
### Does Athina logging add any latency?
![FAQ Minus IconâŸ¨46âŸ©].svg)
Nope, Athina logging can be performed as an async fire-and-forget operation, so it won't impact your latency.
### Does Athina support custom evaluations?
![FAQ Minus IconâŸ¨46âŸ©].svg)
Yes, Athina enables you to configure custom evaluators. You can use a custom LLM evaluation, write a custom Python function, or even call an external API for evaluation.
### Does Athina work with Azure / Vertex / Bedrock?
![FAQ Minus IconâŸ¨46âŸ©].svg)
Yes, you can use custom models hosted anywhere using Athina.
### How long does Athina take to integrate?
![FAQ Minus IconâŸ¨46âŸ©].svg)
You can get set up with logging in just a few minutes. Visit https://docs.athina.ai/logging to get started.
### What kind of evaluations does Athina support?
![FAQ Minus IconâŸ¨46âŸ©].svg)
Athina supports over 50 preset evaluations from providers like Athina, OpenAI, Ragas, Guardrails, and more. You can also configure custom evaluations using LLM-as-a-judge, or custom python functions.

generated_description:
**Athina AI: Streamlining AI Development With a Spreadsheets Twist**

Founded in 2022 and hailing from Y Combinator's W23 batch, Athina AI is a collaborative platform built specifically to help product teams prototype, evaluate, and experiment with AI pipelinesâ€”all through a user-friendly, spreadsheet-like interface. The company is based in a remote, dynamic environment with a lean team of five employees, and it has recently attracted $3M in funding to further enhance its capabilities.

**Mission Statement:**
Athina AI aims to democratize AI development by making it accessible for both technical and non-technical users. This means allowing product managers, QA specialists, data scientists, and engineers to work seamlessly together.

### Key Features

- **Prototype:** With dynamic columns, you can execute LLM prompts, run code, make API calls, and moreâ€”all while enjoying the familiar layout of a spreadsheet.
  
- **Evaluate:** You can assess AI outputs directly in the sheet using more than 50 preset evaluation metrics or create your custom ones, all with no coding necessary.

- **Experiment:** Adjust your prompts, models, or retrievers effortlesslyâ€”technical users can also dive deeper with programmable experiments.

- **Compare:** Easily juxtapose multiple datasets using a diff view, executing evaluations on each simultaneously.

- **Observability:** Keep track of your AI features in real-time with continuous evaluations and detailed analytics to ensure optimal performance.

### Collaboration Made Easy
Athina AI champions collaboration by bridging the gap between technical coders and less technical PMs, allowing teams to engage in AI experiments, dataset evaluations, and prompt management collectively. 

### Core Audience
Whether youâ€™re a data scientist needing advanced analytics, a product manager looking for a no-code solution, or a QA specialist ensuring the quality of your AI outputs, Athina fits the bill. Its design empowers diverse teams to enhance AI product development without getting bogged down by complexity.

### Why Athina?
Athina is designed to accelerate the shipping of AI projects to production tenfold. In an age where speed and adaptability are paramount, this platform stands out for its user-centric approach and cutting-edge functionality, enabling users to build powerful AI applications faster and more efficiently.

In short, if your team is working on AI projects, Athina AI is worth exploring. With a robust set of features geared towards making AI accessible, it might just be the tool that can transform how your team works with artificial intelligence.

Check them out on their website: [Athina AI](https://athina.ai).
